```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(microbenchmark)
library(jeksterslabRlinreg)
context("Test Mean Squared Error.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
n <- 100
sigma2 <- runif(
  n = 1,
  min = 9,
  max = 15
)
beta <- runif(
  n = sample(
    x = 2:5,
    size = 1
  ),
  min = 1,
  max = 3
)
Variable <- c(
  "`n`",
  "`sigma2`",
  "`beta`"
)
Description <- c(
  "Sample size ($n$).",
  "Error variance ($\\sigma^{2}_{\\epsilon}$).",
  "Regression coefficients ($\\beta$)."
)
Value <- c(
  n,
  sigma2,
  paste0(beta, collapse = ", ")
)
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable,
    Description,
    Value
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## Generate Data


```{r generate_data}
X <- matrix(
  data = NA,
  nrow = n,
  ncol = length(beta)
)
for (i in 1:length(beta)) {
  if (i == 1) {
    X[, i] <- rep(
      x = 1,
      times = n
    )
  } else {
    X[, i] <- runif(
      n = n,
      min = -5,
      max = 5
    )
  }
}
y <- X %*% beta + rnorm(
  n = n,
  sd = sqrt(sigma2)
)
```


## Estimate Sum of Squares


```{r estimate}
lm_object <- lm(
  y ~ X[, -1]
)
results_mse_lm <- mean(
  residuals(
    lm_object
  )^2
)
results_rmse_lm <- sqrt(results_mse_lm)
results_mse <- mse(
  betahat = NULL,
  X = X,
  y = y
)
results_rmse <- rmse(
  betahat = NULL,
  X = X,
  y = y
)
results_linreg <- invisible(
  linreg(
    X = X,
    y = y,
    FUN = betahat_inv,
    output = c("coef", "model", "anova")
  )
)
results_mse_linreg <- results_linreg$mse
results_rmse_linreg <- results_linreg$rmse
```


## Summarize Results


```{r results}
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Item = c(
      "$MSE$",
      "$RMSE$"
    ),
    lm = c(
      results_mse_lm,
      results_rmse_lm
    ),
    mse = c(
      results_mse,
      results_rmse
    ),
    linreg = c(
      results_mse_linreg,
      results_rmse_linreg
    )
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01, echo=TRUE}
test_that("mse", {
  expect_equivalent(
    round(
      x = results_mse_lm,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_mse,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_mse_linreg,
      digits = 2
    )
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_02, echo=TRUE}
test_that("rmse", {
  expect_equivalent(
    round(
      x = results_rmse_lm,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_rmse,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_rmse_linreg,
      digits = 2
    )
  )
})
```
